articles.title: 💳 School Fees Reminder
articles.description: Parents and guardians are kindly reminded to complete the payment of school fees on or before [deadline] to ensure smooth academic activities.

articles.title: 🎒 PTA Meeting Notice
articles.description: The Parent–Teacher Association (PTA) meeting will hold on [date] at [time] in the school hall. All parents are encouraged to attend.

articles.title: 📝 Examination / Test Schedule
articles.description: The school examination will commence on [date]. All students are expected to attend classes regularly and prepare adequately.

articles.title: 📢 Resumption Announcement
articles.description: This is to inform parents, guardians, and students that the school will resume for the new term on [date]. Students are advised to resume promptly and come fully prepared.
